review: Pros:Great for Amazon Instant VideoGreat for gamesGreat for sideloading apps.Cons:Spotify, YouTube, and other apps are poor imitations of what you  find on other streaming media players (i.e. Roku, AppleTV)Major connectivity issuesSluggish responses to remote presses compared to my RokuFInal Result: Going back to my Roku3
